edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class RepeatingItemSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.RepeatingItemSet

  • public class RepeatingItemSet
extends PageItem
    This class represents a set of questions that can repeat based on user input. For example adding answers to the question: "Tell us about different schools that you attended".
